effect.diamond-pearl: Raises the user’s evasion by two stages. stomp and steamroller have double power against Pokémon that have used this move since entering the field.
effect.platinum: Raises the user’s evasion by two stages. stomp and steamroller have double power against Pokémon that have used this move since entering the field.
effect.heartgold-soulsilver: Raises the user’s evasion by two stages. stomp and steamroller have double power against Pokémon that have used this move since entering the field.

flavor_text.diamond-pearl: The user compresses its body to make itself look smaller. The user’s evasion stat is boosted.
